title: Independence Day Celebration
content: The school will celebrate Independence Day on 15th August with a cultural program, flag hoisting, and patriotic performances by students.

title: Mid-Term Exams from 19th August
content: Mid-term examinations for all classes will begin on 19th August. Students are advised to check the notice board for the timetable.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting Scheduled
content: A Parent-Teacher Meeting will be conducted on Saturday, 10th August. All parents are requested to attend and discuss their child’s progress.

title: Morning Assembly Theme: Discipline
content: This week’s morning assemblies will focus on the importance of discipline in student life. Class VII A will host the assembly.

title: Admissions Still Open
content: Limited seats are available from Nursery to Class VIII. Interested parents can contact the school office during working hours.

title: Inter-House Sports Event Concludes
content: The inter-house sports competition concluded with Green House winning the overall trophy. Well done to all participants!

title: Tree Plantation Drive
content: Students of classes VI to X participated in a tree plantation drive in the school campus as part of the environmental awareness week.
